title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' action in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui, the resulting package structure in the destination project is incorrect. The package 'ui' is being duplicated.
OB: When the 'copy package' action is performed, the destination project xxx contains a duplicate package 'ui'.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' action, the destination project xxx should not contain a duplicate package 'ui'.
SR:
To replicate the issue: 
1. Create a new project (e.g., xxx2).
2. In the Package viewer, select a package in project A.
3. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
